Baked Lemon Pudding

Baked Lemon Pudding

serves 4 to 6

Yorkshire Pudding

125 ml milk

Mix together

1 egg

2 eggwhites

Pinch salt

125ml flour

drippings

Liberally grease six muffin cups

Bake 15 minutes at 450F; lower oven temperature to 350 and bake another 15 minutes
